# cribl-terraform_pack (Resource)

Pack Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cribl-terraform_pack" "my_pack" {
  description  = "...my_description..."
  disabled     = true
  display_name = "...my_display_name..."
  id           = "...my_id..."
  version      = "...my_version..."
}
```

- `id` (String) Pack name

- `display_name` (String) Requires replacement if changed.
